title: Fragment, 1923-7-40, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: compound weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: White silk with ground figure of tiny curving vines, brocaded with rows of carnations, alternately red and purple, with yellow centers and green foliage.
